overview: Vikram Lakhwara tracks incoming deal flow, performs market analysis and industry due diligence on both incoming business plans and targeted companies, assists on investment execution, and works on business development projects for existing portfolio companies. Before joining SKTVC in 2008, Vik was a marketing analyst for Silicon Valley law firm Wilson Sonsini Goodrich & Rosati. Prior to WSGR, Vik spent four years as an associate at a globally recognized boutique strategic consulting firm, where he worked with mid- and senior-level management of high technology startups, Fortune 500, and Global 100 companies. Vik has a BA in economics from Vassar College. He is based in Menlo Park, California.
